SELECT board.bno, board.writer, type.tname as type, board.title, board.contents, board.price, board.state, date_format(write_date, '%Y/%c/%d') as write_date, board.view_cnt , addrmiddle.addrname,
buy_type, IF(excercise.buy_type = 0 , limit_date, limit_cnt) as useday
checkin_date as useday ticket_date as useday limit_date as useday "내용참조" as useday
FROM board
INNER JOIN excercise ON board.bno = excercise.bno
INNER JOIN travel ON board.bno = travel.bno
INNER JOIN ticket ON board.bno = ticket.bno
INNER JOIN etc ON board.bno = etc.bno
LEFT OUTER JOIN type on board.type = type.tcode LEFT OUTER JOIN addrmiddle ON board.addrcode = addrmiddle.addrcode LIMIT #{reqNum} , 15

select board.bno , board.writer, type.tname as type, board.title, board.contents, board.price, board.state, buy_type, IF(excercise.buy_type = 0 , limit_date, limit_cnt) as useday from board inner join excercise on board.bno = excercise.bno LEFT OUTER JOIN type ON board.type = type.tcode LEFT OUTER JOIN addrmiddle ON board.addrcode = addrmiddle.addrcode ;
